description: Created a platform to match startups with their best-fit SWE candidates. Scaled to 200+ candidates and $50K+ in contingency contracts within two months of launch

Implemented PPO and DQN to train RL agents to make sequential decisions on whether a VC should meet with or invest in a company in a simulated environment. Achieved 75% of the theoretical maximum performance
Built and scaled a matchmaker for meaningful friendships to 1,000+ users and 3,000+ in-person meet ups. Met 3 of my closest friends through the platform
